name: Personal Finance Simulator
description:
Personal Finance Simulator

A personal finance simulation. 30 years of budgeting in 30 minutes or less.

Click "Run" above to start the game in fullscreen.

Development

This game was developed to be a helpful educational game, possibly for schools to use in classes. I started this project in Jan 2017 and stopped around the end of 2018. I stopped working on it because the game wasn't very fun, and I couldn't figure out how to make it fun. I'm still not sure.

Development on this project has halted for now, pending feedback (below) or divine inspiration (hehehe).

Looking for Feedback

Feedback on the game so far is super appreciated, especially these questions:

  1. What about the game is fun for you, as it is now?
  2. What could be changed about the game to make it more fun for you?

Leave a comment or contact me below with any feedback you have on this game. :)

Contact

Direct questions and feedback to me@alexjleone.com.
